definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[גׇּֽרְסָה]] Ps 119:20 fig. [[נַפְשִׁינ לְ]] ´[[ג]] my soul is crushed (i.e. perisheth: cf. Syr.) with longing for (cf. [[כָּלָה לְ]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיַּגְרֵס בֶּחָחָץ שִׁנׇּ֑י]] La 3:16 and he hath crushed my teeth with gravel, fig. of divine chastisement.
